name: Stranded (itch) (The Green Worm)
description:
What is STRANDED ?

You wake up on a small island in the middle of nowhere. Use your time carfully, survive and find a way to escape this sandy prison.

This game was made in 72h for the Global Game Jam 2021

Useful tips :
  • Mouse control only
  • Crafting is key
  • You can create ropes with fibers or plastic in the craft menu
  • Water collectors are a good way to collect rain
  • You won't recover all your energy at night if your bed is bad
  • You won't recover all your energy at night if you are hungry, thirsty or going crazy
  • Build a raft and stock up on food and water to escape the island !
  • Don't forget to pickup the trash that lands on the beach every day !
  • Every day ends at 10pm maximum. You'll loose any ongoing progress
  • If you use all your Energy before 10pm, you'll go to sleep automatically
  • There's a friend hidden somewhere, will you find it ?
